info.description:
Conversion tools for block devices.

    Convert between raw partitions, logical volumes, and bcache
    devices witout moving data.

    See `github.com/g2p/blocks <https://github.com/g2p/blocks#readme>`_
    for installation and usage instructions.
info.keywords: bcache lvm gpt storage partitioning ssd
info.name: blocks
info.html_description:
Conversion tools for block devices.

Convert between raw partitions, logical volumes, and bcache devices witout moving data.

See github.com/g2p/blocks for installation and usage instructions.
